2: 1 We have a house.Have we a house?We haven't a house.
2 Kate has got a red car.Has Kate got a red car?Kate hasn't got a red car.
3We have many friends.Have we many friends?We haven't many friends.
4 They have got a black cat.Have they got a black cat?They haven't got a black cat.
5 My friends have a picture.Have my friends a picture?My friends have not a picture.
